text: Sean Combs is a monster.
I wanna speak about this now,
because I've witnessed everything.
I think Sean Combs can get away
with anything.
I've known Sean since he was four years old.
That's my little bro.
He already knew what he wanted.
I went to a lot of Puffy parties.
and these were the parties that you needed
exclusive access to get in to.
He thought that
if people fear him, they respect him.
Honestly, I didn't want to be around him,
unless there was cameras.
Nobody's shooting me.
Nobody's shooting me!
When Puff was around it was like uh-oh...
get it together or this could be over.
You got me acting crazy in front of all these people!
Something is not right with this.
They said they could ship me off
and sell me to anyone.
How did this superstar music mogul
become an alleged monster?
